commands.name: !picks [playerId]
commands.description: Displays the picks of an individual player

commands.name: !bonuses
commands.description: Displays the bonuses awarded to all players

commands.name: !bonuses [playerId]
commands.description: Displays the bonuses awarded to a particular player

commands.name: !add-celeb [name]
commands.description: Add a celeb to the list of those being tracked.

pickCommands.name: !pick [name]
pickCommands.description: Adds a given celebrity to your list (also joins the game for new players).

pickCommands.name: !remove-pick [name]
pickCommands.description: Removes a given celebrity to your list.

pickCommands.name: !carry-over
pickCommands.description: Carries over all of your surviving picks from last year.

pickCommands.name: !old-picks [player (optional)]
pickCommands.description: See last year's picks to refresh your memory.

aiCommands.name: !ai
aiCommands.description: See the currently selected AI model.

aiCommands.name: !paint [prompt]
aiCommands.description: [**ALPHA - Only an old model available, so very poor quality!**] Generates an image based on the specified prompt.

commands2026.name: !protect
commands2026.description: Blocks one of your picks from a 'steal' attempts by another player, safeguarding your pick.

commands2026.name: !unprotect
commands2026.description: Remove theft protection from one of your picks, allowing you to change your mind and protect another.

commands2026.name: !steal [name]
commands2026.description: Steals a pick identified by the given celeb name from another player.

commands2026.name: !unpick
commands2026.description: Removes one of our picks to make room for stealing/picking another one (same as 'remove-pick', but a bit more intuitive and easier to type)
